text: King Soloman is a 1996 Indian Malayalam film directed by Balu Kiriyath and starring Rahman and Farheen in the lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/king-solomon-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Rahman as Soloman * Sheeba Agarwal as Aswathy * Farheen as Geethanjali Twin Sister * Srividya as Ambika Nair * Innocent as Mahadevan Thampy * Cochin Haneefa as Stereo Basheer * Hemanth Ravan as Peter Rozario *Jose Prakash as Fa.Fernadaz * Indrans as Thurishan Vellayani * Augustine as Rubber Rajappan *Mala Aravindan as Avarachan * Shiju as Ashok Nair *Spadikam George as Kulashekhara Muthalaliyar *Thesni Khan as Sainaba *Sonia as Seethamma *Nandu as Sunny ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: King Soloman
